title: Flyboy Action Figure Comes with Gas Mask
description: Ryan is a shy university student who can turn into a fly.Cassandra is a waitress at a greasy spoon who can make things disappear.In a world of political revolutionaries, indie rockers, zinesters, hardcore feminists, rave kids and slackwater poets, they are the Superheroes for Social Justice ï¿½battling cigarette barrons, redneck tabloids, the patriarcky, and other forces of evil!Impossible, you say? So what?
author: Jim Munroe
